attributes.action: To refuse to implement Article 20 of the Tobacco Products Directive.
attributes.background: Don't ignore the PHE report. I was a smoker, I did NOT want to give up smoking. 2 years ago, bought an e-cig like the Gov will be limiting the public to. It was not good enough to last a day. I needed something bigger/ better.  I  good something the fitted my needs.  I have not smoked since 6/8/13.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105139

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
